title: py#strands-agent
description: Add a Strands Agent to a Python project

project.description: The project to add the Strands Agent to
project.x-prompt: Select the Python project to add the Strands Agent to

computeType.description: The type of compute to host your Strands Agent.
computeType.x-prompt: How would you like to host your Strands Agent server?

name.description: The name of your Strands Agent (default: agent)
name.x-prompt: What would you like to call your Strands Agent? (default: agent)
